name: ABHINAV SAMAJ
briefDescription: Our organisation's main focus is welfare and rehabilitation of elderly/parents de-sheltered by their own children. Presently running a Free Old-Age Home under name 'Jai Ma Durga Old-Age Home' for old-age people where they are provided free food, shelter and medical facilities. 23 old-age people are presently living in our Old-Age Home. Secondly we are interested to work for the women-empowerment, environment protection and child education.
